Title: Tere Mere Sapne
Actors: Chandrachur Singh, Arshad Warsi, Priya Gill
Plot: Balu (Arshad Warsi) is a slick but flat-broke cabdriver whose life is changed forever when he picks up an unhappy young rich man named Rahul (Chandrachur Singh) at the airport one day. Bored with his privileged but empty life, Rah...
